description.value: An extension to provide an indicator of the execution of a double check prior to the administration of certain medication.

purpose.value: This extension represents the DoubleCheckPerformed concept of the Dutch zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) [MedicationAdministration2 v1.1.1 (2020EN)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/MedicationAdministration2-v1.1.1(2020EN)).

definition.value: Was a double check performed prior to the administration? This is only legally required for certain medication.

comment.value: MedicationAdministration has another way to capture that a double check has been performed, namely by marking a performer as _verifier_. Therefore, if a `.performer.actor` exists and `.performer.function` = _verifier_, then DoubleCheckPerformed may be assumed _true_.
